titles.introText: Dive into a world of fascinating creatures. Start exploring now!

descriptions.home: Catch them all with a quick search!

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are two MIAGE students from the University of Orléans. This React project was created to learn how to structure a modern application using a public API.

arthur.bio: Passionate about React, TypeScript, and design systems. Always ready to take on UI challenges.

hakim.bio: Clean backend enthusiast and curious about everything. Lifelong Pokémon fan.
